title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU/GPU runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs with a built-in model library and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK wrapping Ollama’s REST API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for running Ollama models in chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, pulling and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android, Spring, Kotlin); Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in semantic search pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, multimodal, edge deployment.

title: ollama-nomic-embed
summary: Nomic embeddings ported to Ollama format; pull nomic-embed-text.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches & serves Ollama models in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI summarization & Q&A using Ollama models.

title: ollama-lmstudio-bridge
summary: Adapter letting LM Studio consume Ollama’s REST API as an external provider.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: AUTOMATIC1111 extension that uses Ollama LLMs to generate SD prompts & metadata.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Python bot bringing Ollama chat to Telegram groups with per-user quota & history.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice that proxies & extends Ollama with rate-limiting & auth.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; NuGet: Ollama.
